name: The Settlers IV: Gold Edition
content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Blue Byte/Die Siedler IV/S4.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Insert disc
    requires: S4/setup.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_config:
    data:
      Application:
        Company: BlueByte
        Lang: 7
        Name: Settlers4
        Version: 0.0
      AskOptions-0:
        Result: 1
        Sel-0: 0
        Sel-1: 0
      DlgOrder:
        Count: 9
        Dlg0: SprintfBox-0
        Dlg1: SdWelcome-0
        Dlg2: SdLicense-0
        Dlg3: SdSetupTypeEx-0
        Dlg4: SdComponentDialog-0
        Dlg5: SdSelectFolder-0
        Dlg6: SprintfBox-1
        Dlg7: SprintfBox-2
        Dlg8: AskOptions-0
      File Transfer:
        OverwriteReadOnly: NoToAll
      InstallShield Silent:
        File: Response File
        Version: v5.00.000
      SdComponentDialog-0:
        Component-0: Game
        Component-1: Movies
        Component-2: Music
        Component-3: BBInstallShieldExtension
        Component-count: 4
        Component-type: string
        Game-0: Game\LanguageDefs
        Game-1: Game\GFX
        Game-2: Game\Maps(Other)
        Game-count: 3
        Game-type: string
        Game\Maps(Other)-0: Game\Maps(Other)\Singleplayer
        Game\Maps(Other)-1: Game\Maps(Other)\Mutliplayer
        Game\Maps(Other)-2: Game\Maps(Other)\Tutorial
        Game\Maps(Other)-count: 3
        Game\Maps(Other)-type: string
        Result: 1
        szDir: C:\Blue Byte\Die Siedler IV
      SdLicense-0:
        Result: 1
      SdSelectFolder-0:
        Result: 1
        szFolder: Blue Byte\Die Siedler IV
      SdSetupTypeEx-0:
        Result: Custom
      SdWelcome-0:
        Result: 1
      SprintfBox-0:
        Result: 7
      SprintfBox-1:
        Result: 7
      SprintfBox-2:
        Result: 7
    description: Creating installer config file
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/setup.iss
- task:
    args: /s /f1"C:\setup.iss"
    description: Running installator.
    executable: $DISC/S4/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
